name: Yanzo Limited
description: Developer of a text-based personal assistant platform designed to help consumers shop and run their day-to-day errands. The company's platform offers services including shopping, electronics, cleaning, event management, gifting services, floral services, logistics, travel services, home furnishing, and others, enabling users to outsource low-priority activities.
one_liner: Developer of a text-based personal assistant platform designed to help consumers shop and run their day-to-day errands. The company's platform offers services including shopping, electronics, cleaning, event management, gifting services, floral services, logistics, travel services, home furnishing, and others, enabling users to outsource low-priority activities.
